name: DeFoLe-1 _ CanAhmetDarama
description:
My first game for learning Unity. I developed it in 2022. It is a basic "spaceship shooter" with some moving, dashing and shooting mechanics

Sound effects, texture of the ground and the ship models are free assets. I created the rest. All particle effects and scripts were made by me. My main goal was to learn Unity and C# better
